so far there isn't a way to get these on the purchased version correct?
and how do whe instal those?

Find the folder in your "rocksmith" directory called "content" (If it isn't there, create it.)
Put these .dat files in that folder.  That's it.

Themperror > Skidrow

hey, I have not been able to make this or any of the dlcs work. There is no content folder for me, so i made one in the main directory, and also tryed putting them in a few other folder but nothing has worked so far. im using the tinyiso files with the themperror crack. any help would be much apprecieated.
Worked for me. Got original cd/steam version, only had to copy/paste tinyiso crack in the game folder. Created "Content folder" and in it DLC .dat files.
Created my account just to thank Themperror for all torrents of DLC shared...THANKS!
